### Specify here and load librairies
```{r}
here::i_am("eval-grades-FREYERMUTH.Rproj")
library(here)
library(vroom)
library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_bw())

```
## Data Load
```{r}
grades = vroom(here("data","grades.csv"))
```

```{r}
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
```

### Q2
Le dataset contient `r nrow(grades)` notes, on a utilisé nrow(grades).


#### Q3
```{r}
nb_student = grades |>
  distinct(id) |>
  nrow()
```

There is `r nb_student` in the dataset


### Question 4
```{r}

students = grades |>
  select(id,group) |>
  distinct()
```
```{r}
students |>
  slice_tail(n = 5) |>
  knitr::kable()
```


## Q5
```{r}
students |>
  group_by(group) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = group))+
  geom_bar()
  
```
